hooks.command: if [ "$ALLOW_UPSTREAM_EDIT" != "1" ]; then echo '' >&2; echo '  UPSTREAM AGENT-KIT: EDIT BLOCKED' >&2; echo '  This is the upstream template repository.' >&2; echo '  Direct file edits are not allowed.' >&2; echo '' >&2; echo '  Use /promote from a downstream project.' >&2; echo '  See CLAUDE.md for admin procedures.' >&2; echo '' >&2; exit 2; fi

echo '--- CRITICAL CONTEXT (re-injected before compaction) ---'; echo 'UPSTREAM REPO: All changes must go through feature branches + PRs.'; echo 'PIV LOOP: Planning -> Implementation -> Validation. Never mix phases.'; echo 'QUALITY GATES: See .claude/reference/quality-gates.md'; PLAN=$(ls -t .agents/plans/*.md 2>/dev/null | head -1); if [ -n "$PLAN" ]; then echo "ACTIVE PLAN: $PLAN"; fi; BRANCH=$(git branch --show-current 2>/dev/null); if [ -n "$BRANCH" ]; then echo "BRANCH: $BRANCH"; fi
